  • Method Details

    • startTurn

      public void startTurn​(boolean moved_up)
      call the function setUpTurn with the parameters that indicate the number of moves and builds that the player can do and set other variables that are useful for check god's move
      Overrides:
      startTurn in class God
      Parameters:
      moved_up - indicate if athena moved up this turn

    • move

      public int move​(Cell c, Worker w, Map map)
      If yone of your worker moved up on your last turn, opponent workers cannot move up this turn
      Overrides:
      move in class God
      Parameters:
      c - cell in which the player want to move the worker
      w - worker that the player want to move
      map - used only for minotaur power
      Returns:
      0 if the operation is successful, -1 if not near or occupied, -2 if already moved this turn, -3 athena block moved up moves, -4 (Artemis) not back to origin, -6 (Apollo) tried to move in friendly occupied cell.
